cause.description:
We are trying to get more people involved in the Omaha GLBT community. There are many GLBT organizations in our community, but not many people know about them. If anyone donates any money, it will go to the Rainbow Outreach GLBT Center.
1. Everyone should be respected as a human being.
2. Omaha is not as GLBT friendly as it should be.
cause.mission: to raise awareness about the climate for GLBT omahans
cause.name: Make Omaha More GLBT Friendly
